~~~~~~~~~~Stingtra~~~~~~~~~~


*Stingtra watches as the large horse slams h=
er head on her shoulder and sighs*

Stingtra: I did thank you because I lik=
e Quickstrike but not his attitude. I like him alot but I better start thin=
king about someone else. it would work better if he liked me but I guess he=
lp save him two times just isn't enough. He never thanks me and someone doe=
s for anything I do. If I'm staying than I'm ignoring Quickstrike. I'm not =
doing him anymore favors so he can give a damned angry look.

*Stingtra say=
s to Windfire*
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Talon Harvilicz 
  T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, July 31, 2000 10:08 PM
  Subject: Re=
: Neo Beast Wars


  Wildfire: 




  Wildfire slammed her head against Sti=
ngtra's shoulder, but not enough to knock her off balance. 

  Why? she ask=
ed. Seems to me that you were fine with them a few megacycles ago. Even wit=
h Quickstrike. You even thanked me for helping him. Something you hardly he=
ar from a Predacon.

  > 
  =
>*Stingtra says to Windfire*

alon Harvilicz 
  > To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

  > (Hotmail didn't post s=
o I have to write it again.) 
  > 
  > Wildfire/Quickstrike: 
  > 
  &! gt;=
 
  > 
  > 
  > Wildfire pinned her ears back and watched as Stingtra began=
 to walk away. She ran after her and leaped in front of her, with her side =
to her. 
  > 
  > Go back scorpion-bot, she said to her. Do you want to die=
? She imaged weak Quickstrike sitting in the CR chamber with KitKat, Stingt=
ra and herself by him. 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > Quickstrike: 
  > 
  >=
 
  > 
  > Quickstrike scooted to the side of his sleeping area to a spot t=
hat was in the corner. His head hurt and he was still dizzy. He wished some=
thing could do something for his head. He covered his head and laid down. H=
e cocked his leg out and slammed his heel against the wall of the cave.
